content:
I can imagine how satisfying it must be to finally get that nuke after months of trying! M13 is a great choice, and silenced sniper rifles are always a lot of fun to play with. There's something so satisfying about taking out enemies from a distance without them even knowing you're there.

I'm sure you'll be happy to hear that CD Projekt RED is committed to supporting Cyberpunk 2077 with regular updates and patches. They've already released several patches that have addressed many of the game's issues, and they're continuing to work on improving the game's performance and stability.

Fingers crossed that the next patch will fix the specific bugs you've been experiencing and make the game even more enjoyable for you!

By the way, have you explored much of Night City yet? There's so much to see and do in the game, and the city has such a rich atmosphere and history.
